definition: sticky/glutinous/(Tw) to adhere/to stick on/to glue

sentences.english: Don't touch the book with your sticky fingers.
sentences.chinese: 別用你那黏糊糊的手指摸書。

sentences.english: When lives are on the line…and you're poking at brains like they're silly putty.
sentences.chinese: 命懸一線的同時，你正在戳着那些黏糊糊的腦漿。

sentences.english: What's this sticky suff on the floor?
sentences.chinese: 這地板上黏糊糊的是什麼東西？

sentences.english: This stringy mess is known as marine mucilage .
sentences.chinese: 這個黏糊糊的物質被稱爲海洋黏液。

sentences.english: The dumplings were chunky pieces of uncooked dough.
sentences.chinese: 這些餃子是一些黏糊糊的生麪糰塊。

sentences.english: The floor' s very sticky near the cooker.
sentences.chinese: 爐具旁邊地面上黏黏糊糊的。

definition: sticky/glutinous/(Tw) to adhere/to stick on/to glue
(of a couple) to be sweet to each other/lovey-dovey/variant of 膩味|腻味[ni4 wei5]
to adhere/to stick together/to bond/to agglutinate/adhesion/adhesive
to glue/to paste/to adhere/to stick to
(of a child) clingy/(of a pet) fond of interacting with people/friendly
tired of/fed up/sick/(of a person) to annoy/tiresome
(dialect) to dawdle/to waste time/also written 墨跡|墨迹[mo4 ji5]
to mix/to blend/(fig.) to spoil/to mess up things/to run around with (sb)/to get involved with/to mix (with other people)
impatient/to be in a rush (to do sth)/anxious/fretful/agitated
